verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Seek ye first the kingdom of God And His righteousness, And all these things Shall be added unto you. Hallelu. Hallelujah.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Man shall not live by bread alone, But by every word That proceeds from the mouth of God. Hallelu. Hallelujah.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ask and it shall be given unto you, Seek and ye shall find, Knock and it shall be opened unto you, Hallelu. Hallelujah.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let your light so shine before men That they may see your good works, And glorify your Father in Heaven. Hallelu. Hallelujah.{/lang-eng}
